story_28_07000/2401_1001_0100_10:
All this time, you thought you could do whatever
you wanted, wreaking havoc across my island.
story_28_07000/2401_1001_0200_10: Are you ready to face the consequences?
story_28_07000/2401_1001_0300_10: W-we’re so sorry! We apologize for all of it.
story_28_07000/2401_1001_0400_10: Please, I beg you! Spare us!
story_28_07000/2401_1001_0500_10: What do you think, young master?
story_28_07000/2401_1001_0600_10:
Hmm... Shall we, like, take turns beating ’em up?
A li’l payback for all the trouble they’ve caused?
Oooh! How ’bout a lifetime prison sentence?
story_28_07000/2401_1001_0800_10: Nooo! I can’t spend the rest of my life in prison!
story_28_07000/2401_1001_0900_10: All right. I’ve made my decision.
story_28_07000/2401_1001_1000_10: You will all serve the same sentence...
story_28_07000/2401_1001_1100_10:
To serve as my personal retainers and work for
me here on Pasio!
story_28_07000/2401_1001_1300_10:
It won’t just be cleaning duty. You’ll also be
responsible for greeting visitors, assisting with
Pokémon battles, and any other tasks I see fit!
story_28_07000/2401_1001_1400_10:
I’ll pay you for your work and even give you
days off, but play hooky on the job, and you’ll
live to regret it!
story_28_07000/2401_1001_1500_10:
I’m going to work you hard, and I expect results!
Is that understood?
story_28_07000/2401_1001_1700_10: Is that it? We just...have to work for you?
story_28_07000/2401_1001_1900_10:
Are you sure that’s the punishment you want to
go with?
story_28_07000/2401_1001_2000_10:
Well... I’m part of the reason Team Break was
created in the first place.
story_28_07000/2401_1001_2100_10:
If I’d bothered to listen to these people when they
were upset and disappointed, maybe things would
never have gotten this bad.
story_28_07000/2401_1001_2200_10:
So I plan to look after them until they’ve corrected
their ways.
story_28_07000/2401_1001_2300_10:
It’s my responsibility as the host and founder of
the PML.
story_28_07000/2401_1001_2600_10:
You’ll f-forgive us even after we wrecked
everything so bad?
story_28_07000/2401_1001_2800_10: Th-thank you, Lear! I mean, Master Lear!
story_28_07000/2401_1001_2900_10:
Pasio is gonna be the awesomest place ever!
We promise to make up for all the terrible stuff
we did!
story_28_07000/2401_1001_3100_10: Now that that’s taken care of...
story_28_07000/2401_1001_3200_10:
I have a message for everyone on Pasio waiting
to watch the semifinals!
story_28_07000/2401_1001_3300_10:
As you no doubt witnessed, our program for today
was interrupted by a surprise Team Break raid.
story_28_07000/2401_1001_3400_10:
The situation is now under control, but our partner
Pokémon are exhausted and the arena will need
to undergo repairs.
story_28_07000/2401_1001_3500_10:
Therefore, I’d like to postpone today’s semifinal
matches to tomorrow!
story_28_07000/2401_1001_3700_10:
I mean, I AM pretty tired and I want to make
sure my partner gets some rest, but...
story_28_07000/2401_1001_3800_10:
I wonder how the people who’ve been waiting
for this match are going to feel...
story_28_07000/2401_1001_4000_10:
I’m sure some of you think I’m abusing my power
as the PML’s host and postponing the match for
my own selfish reasons.
story_28_07000/2401_1001_4100_10:
But that’s not it at all. I want everyone to be at
their absolute best for this next battle!
